name: Desktop Detective
description:
IMPORTANT

(Press the blue button to play in fullscreen as intended)

Desktop Detective is a short mystery game made for the GMTK 2021 Game Jam. The goal of the game is to link together connecting or contradicting pieces of evidence on a virtual corkboard. Just click on a piece of information and then press another to join them together.

My Socials:

https://twitter.com/KyleGGoodyear

Music by Glaciaere on Bandcamp

https://steviasphere.bandcamp.com/album/shower

Sounds by SubspaceAudio

https://opengameart.org/users/subspaceaudio

(This is the first time I've written anything and I only had a couple hours so the mystery isn't all that great)
